description:
**Fix Overview**:

To address the remote code execution vulnerability in the Microsoft WDAC OLE DB provider for SQL Server (CVE-2024-21366):

1. Download and apply the appropriate KB updates from the Windows Update catalog specific to your version of Windows.
2. Restart your system after installation to ensure the updates take effect.

**Details**:
- The following update packages are available for download:
  - [KB5034766](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5034766) for Windows 11 Version 21H2.
  - [KB5034774](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5034774) for Windows 10 x64 and 32-bit.
  - [KB5034765](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5034765) for Windows 10 Version 22H2.
  - [KB5034763](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5034763) for Windows 10 Version 21H2 and Windows 10 Version 22H2 for 32-bit systems.
- This update aims to mitigate possible exploitation of the heap-based buffer overflow vulnerability referenced by CWE-122.

**Preconditions**:
- Ensure that your system is running one of the affected Windows 10 or Windows 11 versions.
- Backup critical data before proceeding with the update installation.
